item.title: Aukey’s new wireless charger gives you more freedom through the power of the orbs

review.headline_rewrite: Aukey’s new wireless charger gives you more freedom through the power of the orbs
bullets: Pricing will be announced closer to the MagFusion Ark’s release in Q1 of 2026, but it will be available in three different configurations: a bundle that includes a base with three pads and three spheres, as well as one- and two-pad bases with the spheres sold separately.

item.title: LegalZoom Promo Codes and Deals: 20% Off Services

review.headline_rewrite: LegalZoom Promo Codes and Deals: 20% Off Services
bullets: I recently tried it out to make an LLC for my cosmic country band, Steel Fringe (shameless plug), and it appears to have worked just fine (we’re still waiting on a full evaluation from legal experts for a future guide to these services).
There are also installment plan options for products priced at $200 or more, if you really need something done but can’t quite afford it right now.

item.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off

review.headline_rewrite: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off
bullets: The trial lasts one week, is for new subscribers only, and can’t be paired with other offers.
You can stream all of the NFL coverage you want all season long, plus, 24/7 live channels are now streaming on Paramount+, so you’ll never need to give your brain the time to process the horrors.

item.title: Technology Sep 3, 2025 iPhone 17 series price leaks ahead of September 9 launch: Here’s how much it may cost Ahead of the anticipated September 9 'Awe Dropping' event, projections suggest stable pricing for the iPhone 17 series, except for the Pro model. JPMorgan forecasts the iPhone 17 at $799, the Air between $899-$949, and the Pro Max at $1,199. The iPhone 17 Pro is expected to cost $1,099, potentially justified by a storage upgrade to 256GB.

review.headline_rewrite: Technology Sep 3, 2025 iPhone 17 series price leaks ahead of September 9 launch: Here’s how much it may cost Ahead of the anticipated September 9 'Awe Dropping' event, projections suggest stable pricing for the iPhone 17 series, except for the Pro model. JPMorgan forecasts the iPhone 17 at $799, the Air between $899-$949, and the Pro Max at $1,199. The iPhone 17 Pro is expected to cost $1,099, potentially justified by a storage upgrade to 256GB.
bullets: We are less than a week away from the iPhone 17 launch and yet another leak is making headlines.
The series is likely to offer four models â iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max and a slim model likely to be called iPhone 17 Air.

Apple iPhone 17 series price
According to JP Morgan research note, the expected prices of upcoming iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max and iPhone 17 Air are:
- iPhone 17 at $799
- iPhone 17 Air at $899â949
- iPhone 17 Pro at $1,099
- iPhone 17 Pro Max at $1,199
Among these, Apple iPhone 17 Pro is the only model confirmed to see a higher price tag.
To compare, the current iPhone 16 Pro model was launched at $999 (starting price) last year.
The iPhone 17 Air, replacing the Plus model, is the biggest uncertainty.
The move could help Apple maintain strong demand amid a competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Judge Rules Trump Administration Illegally Canceled Harvard Funding

review.headline_rewrite: Judge Rules Trump Administration Illegally Canceled Harvard Funding

bullets:
Grammarly launches new AI agents to assist students and professionals with writing tasks
Grammarly has introduced eight new AI agents within its AI writing surface, 'docs,' designed to aid students and professionals with diverse writing tasks.
These agents offer functionalities like citation finding, plagiarism checking, and AI detection, alongside features predicting reader reactions and providing rubric-based feedback.
This launch signifies Grammarly's move towards agent-based AI to enhance writing across various platforms.
